entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some useless instructions pop up when I am using types with static interface method implementations #95549
  • InvokeAsync in Blazor WASM components calls into the caller thread instead of the UI thread. #95547
  • System.TypeLoadException occurred when there is static ReadOnlyMemory<> field #95544
  • `Directory.GetFiles` using a `searchPattern` of `"foo.*"` returns file named `"foo"` despite `'*'` being a simple wildcard according to the documentation #95541
  • Enable native PGO optimization for more native libraries #95537
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [Broken Build]: Linux build with ipv6 connectivity #95228
  • .NET 8 `QuicConnection` AuthenticationException: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch #95072
    9.0.0
  • ambiguous call on 'OptionsBuilderExtensions' #95524
    Future
  • Extreme Performance issues using SetMinimumLevel #94186
    Future
  • .Net 6.0 Application shows error prompt for ".Net Desktop Runtime" #93977
  • [wasi] Single file build fails with AOT #95273

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Build dominator tree sibling links in RPO #95550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify condition for building cross-Jits #95546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Optimize ves_pinvoke_method () on wasm. #95545
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Revert "Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32" #95540
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: fix issue with out of order importer spilling around some calls #95539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not ignore coreclr.dll load failure in hostpolicy.dll #95538
    area-Host
  • Move most of the remaining Strong Name code to internal to the C++ file and remove duplicate validation #95536
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Consolidate wasi/wasm build bits #95535
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Disable EventSource tests #95498
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Fix/cleanup the encoding/decoding of runtime invoke wrappers. #95523
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Factor SSA's dominator tree computation #95507
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Use RemoteEndPoint host when TargetHost is missing #95518
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser] WS & HTTP clients more async #95483
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] eager allocation of Promise/Task result for async JSImport/JSExport #95411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove workaround for closed issue #95529
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Always unroll GT_STORE_BLK for blocks with gc refs on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix GC regions virtual alloc after #80295 #95526
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [System.Numerics] Cross Product for Vector2 and Vector4 #87968
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Added ARM64 SVE_GA_2A encoding #95435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Add arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CL_3A to IF_SVE_CU_3A #95514
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: alt jit range #95283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish #95496
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Migrate to the 'locker' GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #95432
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Test macOS runtime test crash dump collection #93989
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix comments of Min/MaxMagnitude{Number} #95495
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimize codegen for atomics #2448

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use the "universal" OS for WASM-targeting Jits #2449

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Create throw helper blocks on-demand in codegen #2446

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement WasmImportlinkage #2444
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement atomics #2447

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish --no-restore` fails during `docker build` even if the packages are already restored in a web app with dependent class library #37291
  • Building a library with IsAotCompatible still requires EnableConfigurationBindingGenerator #37290

Closed

  • [APICompat] Document newly added features #27857
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Append command line arguments to project specified RunArguments #37285
    Servicing-consider, Area-Watch

Merged

  • Mark ApiCompatValidateAssembliesSemaphoreFile as internal #37282
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bad parser error recovery in initializer expressions #71065
  • CA1854's automatic fix doesn't account for existing "value" variables #71062

Closed

  • Diagnostics do not work when configured from Solution Explorer #70740
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Pass through folders for additional files #71061
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix exception in PackageSettingsPersister #71027
    Next

Updated

  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update TFM for BuildHost in source build #71035
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce the work done by remove unreachable analyzer when calculating diagnostics #70455
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Pascal and camel case should not allow underscores -- unless "_" is set as word_separator #70506
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Classify suffixes of numerical literals as keywords #70507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support organizing imports as part of LSP document formatting #70538
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include syntax error in Hot Reload diagnostics reported to dotnet watch #70540
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Skip code definition window tests blocked by github copilot #70546
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • [Prototype] Show project-wide first party 'Code analysis suggestions' in lightbulb menu #70621
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix indentation of labels following selection/iteration statements without braces #70641
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix Crash in AbstractChangeImplementationCodeRefactoringProvider #70647
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Invoke code mapper via reflection #70667
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update NuGet-packages.md for 17.8 #70682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid binding when computing explicitly implemented member names #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Removed incorrect parenthesis from file Update Scripting-API-Samples.md #70741
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [Performance]: Cache last PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers result when the result is a namespace #70767
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid binding when computing explicitly implemented member names and metadata names #70783
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make eng/build.sh --test run more unit tests #70793
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update and unskip Razor test #70855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement null conditional await #70916
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Return correct kind for PE lambdas #70920
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make sure completion always use frozen partial semantic #70926
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Port] Handle missing ISimplifactionService implementation for non-C#/VB langauges #70933
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval, untriaged
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate async methods #70941
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Emit `readonly.` for constrained array access #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to vs-extension-testing 0.1.184-beta #70960
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • added preproc for Core specific RCC download paths #70974
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix building executables for language server #71007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reset loop head state when local function starting state changes #71009
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost #71025
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Draft - testing out new API to get semantic model with nullability analysis disabled #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Prioritize Obsolete attribute over siblings #71043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Move background initialization to OnAfterPackageLoadedAsync #71047
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Offer use-primary-constructor on abtract types with protected constructors #71053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cancel the request to copilot when typing start #71055
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Insert release/dev17.9 to rel branch #71057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PreventDefault And StopPropgration In Event #52544
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #52542
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, https #52541
  • asp.net core 8 部署到iis上出现了问题 #52539
  • Incorrect string interpolation throwing InvalidOperationException in WebAssemblyComponentParameterDeserializer #52537
  • Authentication with WebApplicationFactory/TestServer HttpClient #52536
  • Blazor Server does not see RCL components #52533
  • Ability to use route pattern analyzer in non-web projects #52532
  • Perf regression: json #52531
  • "Authorize" attribute in razor page in webassembly project requires also authorization on server side #52530
  • Add FallbackTestPseudoElement property to LinkTagHelper #52529
  • InteractiveServer on Router breaks routers with 2 or more path segments #52543

Closed

  • Building ASP.NET minimal API with either PublishTrimmed or PublishAot throw BadHttpRequestException: Required parameter #52506
  • Perf regression: json #52520
  • Intermittent 'IIS AspNetCore Module V2 throws failed to load coreclr' #50317
  • The .NET 8 Blazor Web App project template places appsettings JSON files in wwwroot of Client project #52476
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #52457
  • Perf improvement: https #52501
  • Root component type could not be found in the assembly RCL #52467

PullRequests

Created

  • Missing $ in WebAssemblyComponentParameterDeserializer when throwing InvalidOperationException #52538
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #52523
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #4417

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQLite db crash the app in .net8 #19173
  • BackButtonBehavior not working #19171

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19169
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Update ShellSectionRenderer.cs #18945
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #19145
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core ignores compiled model with PublishAot flag setted #32496
  • Support ExecuteUpdate when the value selector is a collection #32494
  • Nav expansion does not handle ExecuteUpdate #32493

Closed

  • Borked Owned Entities for PropertyChangingAndChanged #32168
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't consider a generated value stable just because it was explicitly set #32497
  • Proof of concept for #32385 #32495
  • Revert behavior to throw when attempting to modify an unconstrained alternate key property #32492
  • Work on type mapping inference for string concatenation #32491

Merged

  • Use current value in update pipeline when original value is not being tracked #32480

Updated

  • Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32456
  • Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32478
  • Properly support LEAST/GREATEST over nullable value types #32458

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Can't get notifications from GitHub App #11679

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
